breakfast.preparation: Cook oats according to package instructions. Top with berries, honey, and almonds. Serve with almond milk.

items: 2 tbsp olive oil and lemon dressing
lunch.preparation: Grill chicken and slice. Toss with greens and vegetables. Drizzle with dressing.

dinner.preparation: Bake salmon at 375°F for 15-18 minutes. Toss vegetables with olive oil and herbs, roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes. Serve with cooked quinoa.

snacks: 1 cup Greek yogurt with 1 tsp honey

breakfast.preparation: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. Drizzle with honey.

lunch.preparation: Spread hummus on tortilla. Layer with turkey, avocado, lettuce, and tomato. Roll up tightly.

items: 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, snap peas, carrots)
dinner.preparation: Stir-fry tofu until golden. Add vegetables and garlic, cook until tender-crisp. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over brown rice.

breakfast.preparation: Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Beat eggs and pour over vegetables. Cook until set. Serve with toast.

lunch.description: Lentil Soup with Whole Grain Bread
lunch.preparation: Heat soup. Drizzle bread with olive oil and serve alongside soup.

dinner.description: Baked Chicken with Sweet Potato and Broccoli
dinner.preparation: Season chicken with herbs and spices. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes. Serve with baked sweet potato and steamed broccoli.

snacks: 1 cup sliced vegetables with 2 tbsp hummus

breakfast.description: Whole Grain Toast with Avocado and Egg
breakfast.preparation: Toast bread. Spread mashed avocado on toast. Top with poached eggs. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

items: 1 cup roasted mixed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, mushrooms)
lunch.preparation: Combine quinoa, roasted vegetables, and chickpeas in a bowl. Drizzle with tahini dressing and sprinkle with fresh herbs.

dinner.description: Grilled Fish with Asparagus and Brown Rice
dinner.preparation: Season fish with herbs and spices. Grill with lemon slices. Toss asparagus with olive oil and grill. Serve with brown rice.

items: Toppings: 1 tbsp granola, 1 tsp coconut flakes, fresh berries
breakfast.preparation: Blend banana, frozen berries, spinach, almond milk, chia seeds, and almond butter until smooth. Pour into a bowl and add toppings.

items: 2 tbsp olive oil and lemon dressing
lunch.preparation: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Toss with dressing.

items: 1 cup mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, snow peas)
dinner.preparation: Stir-fry beef until browned. Add vegetables and garlic, cook until tender-crisp. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over brown rice.

snacks: 1 cup Greek yogurt with 1 tbsp honey

breakfast.preparation: Mix oat flour, protein powder, mashed banana, eggs, and milk. Cook pancakes on a griddle. Serve with berries and maple syrup.

items: 3 oz canned tuna in water, drained
lunch.preparation: Mix tuna, Greek yogurt, mustard, and celery. Spread on bread. Add lettuce and tomato.

items: 1/2 cup mixed beans (black beans, kidney beans)
1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, zucchini)
dinner.preparation: Simmer beans, vegetables, tomatoes, and spices until heated through. Top with avocado and Greek yogurt.

breakfast.preparation: Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Beat eggs and pour over vegetables. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 375°F for 15 minutes. Serve with toast.

items: 1/2 cup grilled vegetables (zucchini, eggplant, bell peppers)
lunch.preparation: Spread hummus on tortilla. Top with grilled vegetables, spinach, and feta cheese. Roll up tightly.

dinner.description: Baked Salmon with Quinoa and Roasted Brussels Sprouts
dinner.preparation: Season salmon with herbs and spices. Bake at 375°F for 15-18 minutes with lemon slices. Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil and roast at 400°F for 20 minutes. Serve with quinoa.

snacks: 1 small banana with 1 tbsp almond butter

user_preferences.custom_instructions: If I skip breakfast, please increase my lunch portion by about 30% to compensate for the missed calories.
